extendedInfo.description: Get ready for a unique physics-based puzzler. *** FREE DEMO WITH 10 LEVELS ***âââ Top Ranked on Google Play, June 2012 - #1 in USA, Germany, France and United Kingdom (casual games category 06/2012)."Those seeking a straightforward, serious cerebral challenge should look no further", score 8.8/10 (Life of Android)"Beautifully simple mechanic that leads to complex and ridiculously fun dynamics. A must buy for android. Runs beautifully even on low end devices." Marc (User review)In Elastic World you control weird elastic shapes in order to make a ball hit the floating star.Expand and collapse these jelly shapes and make the ball bounce in different directions and heights. Sounds weird but is actually pretty fast to pick up.Each level gets increasingly challenging and sometimes you have to have some pretty quick reflexes as you compete against the clock. The faster you can hit the star, the better you are ranked. Now with Open Feint support. Share your scores with other players and climb your way to the top of the leader boards.Really fun and addicting!**********This lite version contains 10 levels. (40 on the full version)**********Please support independent video game development! This is the result of six months of hard work (done alongside a full-time job). Please give it a good rating.Unlike several other games, the collision detection and physics engine were made entirely from scratch.  The game and the level designer contain more than 28,000 lines of source code.Take a peek under the hood and watch the demo of the level designer, available on YouTube. (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nx-fJVXcpBQ)

reviews.comment: Fun game! Does exactly what is described. Works perfectly on my Xperia X10. I just wish it had more levels for this version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For its age and type a fun game. Not to bad. Looking for drawing something for the ball though. Plesant music!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quite addictive
reviews.comment: I can\'t actually stop playing with it. It\'s awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for everyone.... But fun!
reviews.comment: the game is actually pretty cool. it\'s very challenging if you\'re into this type of game. simple but very clear graphics make this fun little game easy on the eyes, and the music is catchy enough to where you don\'t want to turn the volume all the way down. I read to be in a lot of bad reviews and I almost didn\'t play. if you are the type of person who likes to think and make a decision for yourself I would try the game. if its your cup of tea then you\'ll love it if you\'re not into that type of game then you find something else...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good,but let the free version be whit more levels,free but 10.Let it be like Vector-cool and free game.Thumbs up if youl update it like that.Thanks :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Huh?
reviews.comment: Not sure why this is so highly rated. It\'s quite boring and just not much fun at all. It almost feels more like a tech demo than a fully designed game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Redundant
reviews.comment: Boring after a few levels, they are all pretty much the same
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring gameplay
reviews.comment: The problem with this game is that it is almost random whether you get the ball in or not. You don\'t even need good timing to beat the levels, its just a matter of trial and error. Makes for very boring gameplay since there is no challenge whatsoever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Very original, good job !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Just challenging enough to make you feel satisfied after each problem, but not frustrated from being stuck.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps you entertained for 5 mins

reviews.title: Fun for about 10 minutes
reviews.comment: This game is promising...but you would need to buy the full version. The Free Levels are very easy to beat (sans Level 10). Great graphics and solid music. SAMSUNG CHARGE
